document.full_text: kei nishikori of japan searched the crowd with a glance after he won the second set wednesday against sergiy stakhovsky of ukraine. about a thousand spectators had crowded into seats on court 6 at roland garros.
document.title: crowd helps nishikori feel at home in loss
lines_and_colors: kei nishikori of japan searched the crowd with a glance after he won the second set wednesday against sergiy stakhovsky of ukraine. about a thousand spectators had crowded into seats on court 6 at roland garros.
